info.title: EasyWeek Partner API
info.description: This is public API for EasyWeek partners.

parameters.name: hashid
parameters.description: Booking's hashed id, returned after successful booking creation.

delete.description: Cancel booking using its hashed id.

put.description: Enpoint to update booking to a new status. Final successful and unsuccessful statuses are prohibited.
